ygData.subject: Re: Hell Level
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sol B.  You want the King Room, the Pool Room, the Noble Room (in that order of preference).  Go early and ask to get on the stupid lists.  If you get
ygData.messageBody:
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> I made level 40 yesterday and was wondering if anyone knew what would be a
> good place to go, being a bard I don't have the luxury of being able to
> solo dwarfs all day and make it out of hell.

> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 40 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server

Sol B. You want the King Room, the Pool Room, the Noble Room (in that order of preference). Go early and
ask to get on the stupid lists. If you get there before noon on weekends and six on weekdays (EST) you
have a good chance of getting into something right away. If you really want to get in the King Room (and
you do), put yourself on the list about 6am and go back to sleep.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 45 songs, Innoruuk
